data.name: BROK the InvestiGator Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The BROK the InvestiGator Original Soundtrack composed by Python Blue.

This includes 67 tracks in two versions (mp3 and wav) and 7 exclusive "Synth" remixes.
The tracks are available as an official soundtrack to play directly within Steam, as well as downloaded to your BROK Steam folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1500 MB available space
